item.title: Netmon
item.description: INTRODUCTION Netmon is the second Windows box in my “Let’s brush up on Windows!” series. For the previous one, see my walkthrough on Blue. This box revolves around a network monitoring tool called PRTG. It’s very easy, and a great reintroduction to Windows tools. Recon leads straight into the user flag, skipping any necessity of acquiring a foothold. If recon was done properly, there are only a few options to follow when seeking the root flag.
